Job Title: Dynamics 365 FO Functional Consultant - End User Training Specialist
Ad Text:
Dynamics 365 FO Functional Consultant
D365 FinOps Trainer / Product Specialist 

Sydney CBD base role
Hybrid or Onsite options

Full time permanent role 

Initially this role will have core focus on end-user training and user adoption. Over time this role with transition to a D365 F&O Product Owner Specialist position

  
About the Role
We are seeking an experienced Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations (F&O) Specialist to play an exciting end user training role in a major finance transformation project.  

This role will be instrumental during the go-live phase, ensuring successful user training, user adoption, and help with process alignment

Over time this role will may eventually transition into a D365 F&O PRODUCT OWNER position  
  
Key Responsibilities

Expert System Knowledge: Act as a subject matter expert on D365 F&O, leveraging its full range of features and capabilities.
End-User Training: Develop and deliver training sessions, work closely with accounting end users empowering staff to use D365 F&O effectively.
Drive User Adoption: Promote confidence and uptake of the system by end users across finance functions.
System & Process Challenge: Critically evaluate current workflows and suggest improvements that enhance efficiency and accuracy.
Testing & Validation: Assist with UAT (User Acceptance Testing) phase ensuring systems and processes meet business requirements.
Support the Go-Live Phase: Provide hands-on assistance during the critical implementation stage.

Skills & Experience

Proven experience with Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance & Operations (F&O), particularly in finance modules.
Excellent ability to train and mentor end-users.
Analytical mindset with the ability to challenge systems and processes constructively.
Understanding of finance processes and their alignment with ERP systems.
Experience supporting system implementations and go-lives and/or UAT testing phases preferred
Only Sydney based candidates considered 
Desirable
Exposure to training, change management and user adoption strategies.
Relevant certifications in Dynamics 365 or finance systems ideal

Keen to learn more? Apply today we look forward to hearing from you
